mapper.sql: PK_BM_PORT, VERSION, PROV_CODE, PORT_TYPE, PROTOCOL, PORT, SEVERITY_LEVEL, IS_DELETED, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from adc_bm_port
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into adc_bm_port
PK_BM_PORT,
VERSION,
PROV_CODE,
PORT_TYPE,
PROTOCOL,
PORT,
SEVERITY_LEVEL,
IS_DELETED,
PK_CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
PK_MENDER,
MEND_TIME_LAST,
#{pkBmPort,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{portType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{severityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update adc_bm_port
PK_BM_PORT = #{record.pkBmPort,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROV_CODE = #{record.provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT_TYPE = #{record.portType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROTOCOL = #{record.protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT = #{record.port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEVERITY_LEVEL = #{record.severityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_MENDER = #{record.pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEND_TIME_LAST = #{record.mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update adc_bm_port set PK_BM_PORT = #{record.pkBmPort,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROV_CODE = #{record.provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT_TYPE = #{record.portType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROTOCOL = #{record.protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT = #{record.port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEVERITY_LEVEL = #{record.severityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{record.pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{record.mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update adc_bm_port
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROV_CODE = #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT_TYPE = #{portType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROTOCOL = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEVERITY_LEVEL = #{severityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PK_BM_PORT = #{pkBmPort,jdbcType=CHAR}

update adc_bm_port set VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROV_CODE = #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT_TYPE = #{portType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROTOCOL = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEVERITY_LEVEL = #{severityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_BM_PORT = #{pkBmPort,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`PK_BM_PORT`,a.`PROV_CODE`,a.`PORT_TYPE`,a.`PROTOCOL`,a.`PORT`,a.`SEVERITY_LEVEL`,a.`PK_CREATOR`,a.`CREATE_TIME` FROM `adc_bm_port` a WHERE a.`PROV_CODE`=#{id} AND a.`IS_DELETED`=0
